alert.note: Alert for Clark; Jackson; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 8:49AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact southern Clark, northwestern Jackson and northeastern Trempealeau Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 849 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Osseo, or 15 miles northeast of Whitehall, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Price around 855 AM CDT. Humbird around 905 AM CDT. Neillsville around 920 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Highway 73 And 98, Wildcat Mound, Tioga, Christie, Highway 10 And Bald Peak Road, Lynn, Globe, Northfield, Riplinger, and County K And Capital Road. This includes Interstate 94 between mile markers 88 and 99. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
